author: andschwa
body: A couple  unnecessary  properties are added here and set with `if  implementingType == typeof Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.FileSystemProvider  && !Platform.IsWindows`. This would all might be better accomplished by comparing with `System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar` VSO create date - 8/31/2015 9:31:00     VSO closed date - 9/4/2015 15:53:00
title: monad DataStoreAdapterProvider.cs: Fix pathSeparatedByColon
